<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Updating state choice label from Work in Progress to Approved and from Closed Complete to Rejected on dmn_decision_baseline table</description>
        <name>Updating Decision Baseline state choices</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var approvedChoiceGr = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
	approvedChoiceGr.addQuery('name', 'dmn_decision_baseline');
	approvedChoiceGr.addQuery('element','state');
	approvedChoiceGr.addQuery('language','en');
	approvedChoiceGr.addQuery('value','2');
	approvedChoiceGr.addQuery('label','Work in Progress');
	approvedChoiceGr.query();
	if(approvedChoiceGr.next()){
			approvedChoiceGr.setValue('label','Approved');
			approvedChoiceGr.setWorkflow(false);
			if(approvedChoiceGr.update())
				gs.log("State Choice label is changed from Work in Progress to Approved on Decision Baseline table");
	}

var rejectedChoiceGr = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
	rejectedChoiceGr.addQuery('name', 'dmn_decision_baseline');
	rejectedChoiceGr.addQuery('element','state');
	rejectedChoiceGr.addQuery('language','en');
	rejectedChoiceGr.addQuery('value','3');
	rejectedChoiceGr.addQuery('label','Closed Complete');
	rejectedChoiceGr.query();
	if(rejectedChoiceGr.next()){
			rejectedChoiceGr.setValue('label','Rejected');
			rejectedChoiceGr.setWorkflow(false);
			if(rejectedChoiceGr.update())
				gs.log("State Choice label is changed from Closed Complete to Rejected on Decision Baseline table");
	}
]]></script>
